articles.content: Reas hopes of completing a second consecutive Assen WorldSBK hat-trick were dashed, as was Razgatlioglus efforts of winning a first race this season, by contact that has often been made between the t… [+3994 chars]

articles.author: Srinivas Sadhanand
articles.title: Pep Guardiola Makes Worrying Manchester City Admission Ahead of Champions League Clash Against Real Madrid - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: Manchester City hailed Oleksandr Zinchenko for his 'exceptional' display in his side's 5-1 win against Watford in the Premier League on Saturday afternoon but was critical of the defence ahead of Real Madrid's visit to the Etihad Stadium next week.
articles.content: It’s safe to say that the 2021/22 season has been one to forget for Oleksandr Zinchenko so far, having made just 21 appearances across all competitions for Manchester City since the start of the camp… [+2386 chars]

articles.title: 'Electric' - Derby County old boy sends classy message - Derbyshire Live
articles.description: The former Derby County striker returned to Pride Park with Bristol City for Saturday's Championship clash and was welcomed by a crowd for the first time since leaving permanently in 2020
articles.content:
Former Derby County centre-forward Chris Martin has sent the club a classy message on social media after returning to Pride Park for the first time in front of fans since leaving.
